public ref class DataRowExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: Defines the extension methods to the class.

span.span: Defines the extension methods to the class.

summary.span: This is a static class.

span.span: This is a static class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks API 已得到扩展，使用两种新方法类，和。The API has been extended with two new methods of the class, and . 你可以使用它们向窗体[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]表达式和针对方法查询对象。You can use these to form [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expressions and method queries against objects. 它们是推荐的方法，用于访问内的列值[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]表达式和方法的查询。They are the recommended methods to use for accessing column values within [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expressions and method queries. 有关详细信息，请参阅[泛型字段和 SetField 方法](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generic-field-and-setfield-methods-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Generic Field and SetField Methods](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generic-field-and-setfield-methods-linq-to-dataset.md).

summary.span: Provides strongly-typed access to each of the column values in the .

span.span: Provides strongly-typed access to each of the column values in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示**null**值替换的实例类。The class represents **null** values with the instance of the class. 一个[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]访问的列的表达式**null**值会生成在运行时。A [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expression that accessed a column with a **null** value would generate a at run time. 此外，不支持可以为 null 的类型。Additionally, does not support nullable types. 方法提供用于访问为 null 的类型的列的支持。The method provides support for accessing columns as nullable types. 如果基础中的值是，则返回可以为 null 的类型将具有值为**null**。If the underlying value in the is , the returned nullable type will have a value of **null**. 如果指定的值是并`T`是引用类型或为 null 的类型，返回类型将是**null**。If the value of the specified is and `T` is a reference type or nullable type, the return type will be **null**. 方法不会返回。The method will not return . 方法不执行类型转换。The method does not perform type conversions. 如果需要类型转换，你首先获取列的值使用方法。If type conversion is required, you should first obtain the column value by using the method. 然后，该列的值应转换为另一种类型中。The column value should then be converted to another type.

exception.span: The value type of the underlying column could not be cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .

span.span: The value type of the underlying column could not be cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .

exception.span: The column specified by does not occur in the that the is a part of.

span.span: The column specified by does not occur in the that the is a part of.

exception.span: A **null** value was assigned to a non-nullable type.

span.span: A **null** value was assigned to a non-nullable type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示**null**值替换的实例类。The class represents **null** values with the instance of the class. 一个[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]访问的列的表达式**null**值会生成在运行时。A [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expression that accessed a column with a **null** value would generate a at run time. 此外，不支持可以为 null 的类型。Additionally, doesn’t support nullable types. 方法提供用于访问为 null 的类型的列的支持。The method provides support for accessing columns as nullable types. 如果基础中的值是，则返回可以为 null 的类型将具有值为**null**。If the underlying value in the is , the returned nullable type will have a value of **null**. 如果指定的值是**null**并`T`为引用类型或为 null 的类型，则返回类型将是**null**。If the value of the specified is **null** and `T` is a reference type or nullable type, then the return type will be **null**. 方法不会返回。The method will not return . 方法不执行类型转换。The method does not perform type conversions. 如果需要类型转换，你首先获取列的值使用方法。If type conversion is required, you should first obtain the column value by using the method. 然后，该列的值应转换为另一种类型中。The column value should then be converted to another type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`是**null**，则方法转换**null**值设置为中基础。If `value` is **null**, the method converts the **null** value to in the underlying . 方法不执行任何类型转换。The method does not perform any type conversions. 但这并不意味着不会发生类型转换。This does not mean, however, that a type conversion will not occur. 方法公开 [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] 类的 行为。The method exposes the [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] behavior of the class. 可以通过执行类型转换对象和转换后的值随后将保存到的行。A type conversion could be performed by the object and the converted value would then be saved to the row. 异常可通过向上传递方法从基础对象。Exceptions can be passed up through the method from the underlying object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`是**null**，则方法转换**null**值设置为中基础。If `value` is **null**, the method converts the **null** value to in the underlying . 方法不执行任何类型转换。The method does not perform any type conversions. 但这并不意味着不会发生类型转换。This does not mean, however, that a type conversion will not occur. 方法公开 [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] 类的 行为。The method exposes the [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] behavior of the class. 可以通过执行类型转换对象和转换后的值随后将保存到的行。A type conversion could be performed by the object and the converted value would then be saved to the row. 异常可通过向上传递方法从基础对象。Exceptions can be passed up through the method from the underlying object.

exception.span: The column specified by cannot be found.

span.span: The column specified by cannot be found.

exception.span: Occurs when attempting to set a value on a deleted row.

span.span: Occurs when attempting to set a value on a deleted row.

exception.span: The value type of the underlying column could not be cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .

span.span: The value type of the underlying column could not be cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .
